titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3080) to provide for improvements to the rivers and harbors of the United States, to provide for the conservation and development of water and related resources, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 113-251, by Mr. Webster (FL).
The resolution makes in order as original text for purpose of amendment, an amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 113-24.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 68.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 385.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 225 - 194 (Roll no. 554).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 271 - 147 (Roll no. 555).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/22/2013--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3080) to provide for improvements to the rivers and harbors of the United States, to provide for the conservation and development of water and related resources.
